tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon - 4th September 2012
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Arnav hesitates to enter Anjali's room but Khushi urges him to comfort her. Shyam visits Anjali at the hospital and pretends to be devastated by the loss of their child. Arnav beats him and throws him out but Dadi defends Shyam. Shyam plans to use Anjali's miscarriage as a way to return to Shantivan. Dadi criticizes Arnav for bringing Anjali home from the hospital before her full recovery. Arnav warns his family not to consider bringing Shyam back to Shantivan.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: @NivrenArshi wow heard his full name for the first time ,,, hw do u knw it anyways !!!﻿
Loved how Arnav knew where his priorities lied and do not want so much of Shyam Anjali drama. It has﻿ now been going for more then a year.

wat a episode!! i just loved it.most awaited acenes arnav finally punch that scoundrel shaym nt only slap & couple of punches.when he said he is the father of that dead child.arshi scenes its just epic!! now i know di is arnav's weakness glad to see khushi is arnav's strength & backbone, amazing khushi loved how beautifuly u consoled arnav,make him﻿ realize to face his poor di hats off cv's such a mindblowing episode conveys lots of abt life pertner ideal soulmates like arshi worst like shamali
If you go back and watch those episodes of 2011 when Khushi was employed at the Raizada house you'll know how serious and sad this drama has﻿ become.
hate shyam﻿
Watch full episode on my channel﻿
my﻿ fave part is when shyam is hit! LOL

I wouldlove to c shyam get a paralysis attach when he does that twisted smile and it stays﻿ on forever... What a devil... What a sleeze bag... How can he hold a straight face and say baccha ka koneke dhardh... Ughhhh i want shyam out of this serial...
Lol! I think I heard it from Arnav when he got angry at Shyam once therefore saying his full﻿ name haha! If u look back then u can see it lol
Watch episode﻿ on my channel
Shit Shit only Shit.....Will they ever show Khushi﻿ on the Show....I mean real Khushi...not the hottie
nice ﻿
everyone r﻿ bastards except khushi...

Get lost Shyam Monohar Jha!!! Nobody wants u here! Leave Arnav and Khushi in peace...let them be happy!!! They should bring in a new evil person now!! Sick of﻿ this Shyam drama! Anyway love IPKKND all the way!
guysssssssss ipkknd trp increased.love this show.best﻿ show on tv n arjun also.love sarun
like todays episode nice gud job ipkkd andd sry for nt trusting new writer﻿ and c..d. all the best ipkkd and thanks for this nice episode
Arshi rock...ipkknd rock...﻿

We are fed up of anjali and shyams disgusting drama. We ALL want shyam to be caught Straight away and he MUST go to jail Forever. We want Khushi's and Arnav's wedding﻿ to happen asap. We want dadi to go to asrom. We don't want All that attention on anjali that dumbo brain anymore.
Good for﻿ shyam. Scoundrel
Watch Iss pyar Jo Kya Naam Doon﻿ episode on my channel
lovely epi thanks sp n ipk team for﻿ gving such lovely epi
